title: Welcome to FROSTR
description: Igloo mobile is a multi-signature signing device for notes and other stuff. It connects to your other signing devices over nostr, using the FROSTR protocol.
warning: This software is in alpha. Do not use your main private keys. You have been warned. Use at your own risk!
features: Secure enclave for storing your secrets.
QR code scanning for easy setup.
gettingStarted: You will need Igloo Desktop or Igloo CLI in order to generate a set of keys. You can then import one of the keys into Igloo Mobile. For a full setup guide, please visit our website.
